body:
Hi, @aybberk . 
Because `name_scope` is only for operations, you should use `tf.variable_scope("MY_SCOPE")` which is designed for variables. 

You might be interested on the post: [What's the difference of name scope and a variable scope in tensorflow?](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35919020/whats-the-difference-of-name-scope-and-a-variable-scope-in-tensorflow)
